courseDescription:
Not only does social housing offer affordable rentals but it can also offer a promising career option to those interested in administration and management. What are the different types and benefits of social housing? This course explores the purpose and allocation of social housing. You will learn about the roles and responsibilities of a tenant manager as you dive into the strategic approaches of housing associations.

As you progress through the general management of social housing, you will become acquainted with the organisation structure of the housing association before learning maintenance guidelines and available safety procedures. The section on roles and responsibilities of tenants, their participation and involvement will equip you with people management skills. In addition, studying anti-social behaviour and how to deal with it will be helpful to your learning experience.

Finally, you will glimpse the challenges and opportunities in the social housing sector. What is the future of social housing? How can you succeed as a housing officer? While advanced management skills develop on the job, you need some basic knowledge to get started. This course will help you to do just that with its step-by-step explanation. It will teach you the essentials of this sector, and you must grab this opportunity to learn. Register today.

modules.description: Social housing provides affordable homes to people in the low-income group. This module will teach you the basics of managing social housing. It will cover allocation, housing tenures, managing tenants, rentals, arrears, safety, maintenance and security. You will understand the purpose of social housing and what its management entails.
